text: The Razor's Edge is a 1946 American romantic drama movie directed by Edmund Goulding and was based on the 1944 novel of the same name by W. Somerset Maugham. It stars Tyrone Power, Gene Tierney, John Payne, Anne Baxter, Clifton Webb, Herbert Marshall, Lucile Watson, Frank Latimore, Elsa Lanchester and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for 4 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1947. The film was released wide by Twentieth Century Fox on December 25, 1946, in 300 locations across the United States. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1946 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Edmund Goulding
title: The Razor's Edge
